articles.author: Simon Smale
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou silences doubters with superb debut season in Europe, claiming Scottish Premiership with Celtic - ABC News
articles.description: There were few in the British press who heralded Ange Postecoglou's appointment as Celtic manager. Fast forward a season and those doubters have been left eating their words as the Australian did what he does best. Win.
articles.content:
We shouldn't have been surprised.
In fact, plenty of Australian football fans will say they foresaw this success for Ange Postecoglou, even if the rest of the footballing world barely disguised thei… [+7318 chars]

articles.title: WATCH | London Irish's Creevy cited for alleged hair-pull on Etzebeth - News24
articles.description: London Irish hooker Agustin Creevy has been cited for allegedly pulling Eben Etzebeth's hair during a European Challenge Cup quarter-final away to Toulon.
articles.content:

articles.title: Loneliness during COVID increased by 5% across Global North - Open Access Government
articles.description: The data, looking at loneliness during COVID in North America and Europe, finds "the pandemic does appear to have increased loneliness"
articles.content:
The findings, published in the American Psychologist, suggests that loneliness during COVID significantly increased across North America and Europe.
